room_title: Escape room "The Barbershop" by Unlocked: Escape Room Wooster in Mansfield
room_description: This once was Ryan Helm’s Barbershop. You were one of Ryan’s most loyal customers and went to visit Ryan in the hospital. As Ryan began his last breath, he started to tell you that his will and money were hidden in his Barbershop. You only have 45 minutes to find the will and the cash, or the city will demolish the barbershop and Helm's Barbershop will be gone forever.
